file_content.text: Good work out there! Fort Garnik's sending a mechanic out here to try to patch up my AT. I hope she'll pull through. I'm fond of this old junkheap.
You put on quite the light show out there. I'm impressed. I'd say you've earned your pay today!
Those stolen weapons are spilling Republic blood. I want them destroyed ASAP!
Looks like you're in a bind. Who took down your ride?
I'm with Havoc Squad. What's the situation, Commander?
Blasted seps. Look at my AT. Their rocket launchers tore through the durasteel hide like it was nothing.
From the look of the vapor trails, I'm thinking Merr-Sonn MX-2s. That's stolen Republic ordnance! They're using our own weapons against us.
The rockets were launched from the bridge. I need those rocket gunners taken out, and every cache of stolen weapons on Mannett Point destroyed. Are you game?
You'll be rewarded for your efforts, I promise you. Good luck over there.
You're a real hero, aren't you? Let me know if you run into anyone who gives a flip about loyalty, will ya?
